name: 2022 the 6th International Conference on Virtual and Augmented Reality Simulations
content: Proceedingsï¼š Accepted and presented papers will be published in the ICVARS 2022 Conference Proceedings, which will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM, archived in ACM Digital Library, and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). The ISBN number assigned to ICVARS 2022 is 978-1-4503-8733-0
